# For all Wwise

add_definitions(-DAUDIOKINETIC -DAKSOUNDENGINE_EXPORTS -D_CRT_STDIO_ARBITRARY_WIDE_SPECIFIERS -D_CRT_SECURE_NO_WARNINGS -D_CRT_SECURE_NO_DEPRECATE -D_CRT_NON_CONFORMING_SWPRINTFS -D_UNICODE -DUNICODE)
if (${GAME_CONFIG} STREQUAL "Final")
    add_definitions(-DAK_OPTIMIZED)
endif()
if (${CMAKE_BUILD_TYPE} STREQUAL "Release")
    add_definitions(-DNDEBUG)
else()
    add_definitions(-D_DEBUG)
endif()
if (WIN32)
    add_definitions(-DWIN64 -D_WINDOWS)
endif()

if (MSVC)
    # /arch:SSE - only for 32-bit
    add_compile_options(/JMC /GS- /W3 /Zc:wchar_t /Zi /Gm- /Zc:inline /fp:fast /errorReport:prompt /GF /WX- /Zc:forScope /GR- /Gd /Oy- /Oi /FC /nologo /diagnostics:column /wd4275)
    if (${CMAKE_BUILD_TYPE} STREQUAL "Release")
        add_compile_options(/O2 /Ob2 /MT)
    else()
        add_compile_options(/Od /Ob0 /MTd)
    endif()
else()
    add_compile_options(-std=c++14)

    add_compile_options(-fPIC -ffast-math -finput-charset=UTF-8 -fshort-wchar)
    add_compile_options(-ffunction-sections -fdata-sections)
    add_compile_options(-mfpmath=sse -msse3)

    # Verbose output
    add_compile_options(-v)
    add_link_options(-v)
endif()
